page.title: 11Recreation
page.content: Comber is a small town but has quite good sports facilities. At the minute there is a new{Leisure Centre}being built which will have badminton and squash courts, as well as a multi_purpose hall. There are tennis courts nearby and there are also hockey, cricket and football pitches. Many people enjoy swimming but in the meantime we must go to the Newtownards pool. There is a snooker hall in Comber along with facilities for fishing and boating. A few miles out of Comber there is a riding school. In Comber there are also Youth Clubs and all the Church Organisations: Scouts, Guides and Girls' and Boys' Brigades. There are also "Ulster Ways" for walking and cycling. The best improvement, in my view, would be a swimming pool, as it would save bus fares.
